name: Blue Balls: A Sonic Fangame
description:
This is a super small infinite runner mini-game based on Sonic 3 & Knuckles' Blue Spheres game. Hopefully the cursed Mixamo turtle and the name of the game make it clear that this is a joke.

I don't own the music or sounds used in this game. Sonic the Hedgehog, the song, and the sounds used in this game belong to SEGA.
